misc.desc: Lightweight, decent battery life, very cheap!

misc.desc: For an extraordinarily cheap price, you get a fully functional laptop, with good battery life and a small form factor. This chromebook is light, and it looks professional. The storage is very limited, so you will not be storing anything other than documents on this machine. You will be relying on having a good internet connection if you want to use this for entertainment, too.

misc.desc: You would think that no one would be crazy enough to make an 18-inch laptop that weighs a full ten pounds. You would say that no one will ever put a full mechanical keyboard in a laptop. You might even believe that putting in TWO discrete GPUs in a mobile form factor will never, ever happen. And you would be wrong!
misc.title: longdesc

misc.desc: This Skylake quadcore has hyperthreading, and it can be overclocked. Yes, an overclockable mobile CPU.
misc.title: cpudescription

misc.desc: Not many people are brave enough to SLI two high-end GPUs and then put them in a laptop. Yes, your battery life is laughable, but your gaming performance is fantastic!
misc.title: gpudescription

misc.desc: Great general performance, exceptional gaming performance
misc.title: pros

misc.desc: The eye-watering price is not for the faint of heart (or those with shallower pockets), but this is a mobile machine that can run Crysis 3 on 1080p on ultra settings. Please note the large size, poor battery life, and heavy weight. Once you are done noting that, you can also note the best-in-class performance in every other metric.
misc.title: longdesc

misc.desc: This Skylake quadcore has hyperthreading, and it can be overclocked. Yes, an overclockable mobile CPU.
misc.title: cpudescription

misc.desc: Taking the two best mobile GPUs, and putting them tegether in a mobile form factor. It is insane. You should not do it. And yet here we are. This is one of the best mobile gaming setups currently available.

misc.desc: Great general performance, exceptional gaming performance
